ygData.subject: Re: Warning about Accelerando
ygData.msgSnippet: There is an NPC in South Karana who is a member of the unkempt druids.  She is constantly SoC (Spirit of Cheetah) and she will easily outrun a bard with a
ygData.messageBody:
There is an NPC in South Karana who is a member of the unkempt druids. She
is constantly SoC (Spirit of Cheetah) and she will easily outrun a bard with
a drum. Also Captain Shralok in Kithicor Forest can keep up with the sung
version of Accelerando. Just curious, has anyone discovered whether or not
accelerando's speed increases with levels? I am lv 24, and I havent really
noticed any difference, but then i use the song much every level and i
couldnt really tell even if there was a difference.

Ka`Lend, 24th Wood Elven Bard of Rallos Zek

-----Original Message-----
From: John Kim [mailto:kim@...]
Sent: Wednesday, June 02, 1999 12:56 PM
To: eqbards@onelist.com
Subject: [eqbards] Warning about Accelerando


From: John Kim <kim@...>

There are mobs that can keep up with you with Accelerando
*with* a drum.
